name: Dragon Pokemon Showdown Skin
description: A pokemon dragon type based skin. If you want to talk to me about any bugs or problem with the css contact me on Wisp, I'm usually under the name Master Float.
additional_info: Update on the 17th of May:    - MegaEvo checkbox button fix!    - .select:focus and .menugroup .button:focus fix! Update on the 28th of June: updated the menugroup buttons! Update on the 22nd of October: battles fixed!

discussions.name: Great style! but need to be fixed
